column4: ok i have this problem, i downloaded ubuntu.iso and burned it into a blank cd, then booted from the disk. then go to he desktop and i try it around. i like and select install from the desktop. i complete all the steps  from 1-4 and in step 5 i select the disk space i want to use and then i press forward. then my cd-drive starts to read from the cd again but then it stops. nothing happens...
